zh-cn: 沙奎尔·拉肖恩·「侠客」·欧尼尔

description.zh-cn: 美国前职业篮球运动员、说唱歌手、演员及电视球评。被广泛认为是NBA历史上最具统治力的中锋之一。
description.en: American former professional basketball player, rapper, actor, and television analyst. Widely regarded as one of the most dominant centers in NBA history.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国路易斯安那州的一所公立大学，沙奎尔·奥尼尔曾在此就读并效力于其篮球队。
description.en: A public university in Louisiana, USA, where Shaquille O'Neal attended and played for its basketball team.

description.zh-cn: 一支位于美国佛罗里达州奥兰多的职业篮球队，是沙奎尔·奥尼尔职业生涯的起点。
description.en: A professional basketball team based in Orlando, Florida, USA, where Shaquille O'Neal began his professional career.

description.zh-cn: 一支位于美国加利福尼亚州洛杉矶的职业篮球队，沙奎尔·奥尼尔在此赢得了三次NBA总冠军。
description.en: A professional basketball team based in Los Angeles, California, USA, where Shaquille O'Neal won three NBA championships.

description.zh-cn: 美国职业篮球运动员，曾与沙奎尔·奥尼尔在洛杉矶湖人队搭档，共同赢得三次总冠军，但后期两人关系出现矛盾。
description.en: An American professional basketball player who partnered with Shaquille O'Neal on the Los Angeles Lakers, winning three championships together, though their relationship became strained in later years.

description.zh-cn: 一支位于美国佛罗里达州迈阿密的职业篮球队，沙奎尔·奥尼尔在此赢得了他第四个NBA总冠军。
description.en: A professional basketball team based in Miami, Florida, USA, where Shaquille O'Neal won his fourth NBA championship.

description.zh-cn: 一支位于美国亚利桑那州凤凰城的职业篮球队，沙奎尔·奥尼尔曾在此效力一个赛季。
description.en: A professional basketball team based in Phoenix, Arizona, USA, where Shaquille O'Neal played for one season.

description.zh-cn: 一支位于美国俄亥俄州克里夫兰的职业篮球队，沙奎尔·奥尼尔曾在此效力一个赛季。
description.en: A professional basketball team based in Cleveland, Ohio, USA, where Shaquille O'Neal played for one season.

description.zh-cn: 一支位于美国马萨诸塞州波士顿的职业篮球队，是沙奎尔·奥尼尔职业生涯的最后一站。
description.en: A professional basketball team based in Boston, Massachusetts, USA, which was the final stop of Shaquille O'Neal's professional career.

nodes.id: 奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂

zh-cn: 奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂
en: Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame

description.zh-cn: 纪念为篮球运动作出贡献的人物和团队的美国机构。
description.en: An American institution that honors individuals and teams who have contributed to the sport of basketball.

description.zh-cn: 由国际篮球联合会设立，旨在表彰世界范围内为篮球运动做出卓越贡献的个人。
description.en: Established by the International Basketball Federation (FIBA) to honor individuals who have made outstanding contributions to the sport of basketball worldwide.

description.zh-cn: 美国新泽西州最大的城市，沙奎尔·奥尼尔的出生地。
description.en: The largest city in the state of New Jersey, USA, and the birthplace of Shaquille O'Neal.

description.zh-cn: 沙奎尔·奥尼尔的母亲。
description.en: The mother of Shaquille O'Neal.

description.zh-cn: 沙奎尔·奥尼尔的生父。
description.en: The biological father of Shaquille O'Neal.

description.zh-cn: 沙奎尔·奥尼尔的继父，美国陆军中士，对奥尼尔的成长和篮球生涯有重要影响。
description.en: Shaquille O'Neal's stepfather, a U.S. Army sergeant who had a significant influence on O'Neal's upbringing and basketball career.

description.zh-cn: 1992年举行的NBA年度选秀大会，沙奎尔·奥尼尔在此次选秀中以状元身份被奥兰多魔术队选中。
description.en: The annual NBA draft held in 1992, where Shaquille O'Neal was selected by the Orlando Magic as the first overall pick.

description.zh-cn: 美国前职业篮球运动员、教练，曾在洛杉矶湖人队执教沙奎尔·奥尼尔，并带领球队完成三连冠。
description.en: American former professional basketball player and coach, who coached Shaquille O'Neal with the Los Angeles Lakers, leading the team to three consecutive championships.

description.zh-cn: 美国前职业篮球运动员，球员时期曾与沙奎尔·奥尼尔在场上发生冲突，退役后成为同事和好友。
description.en: American former professional basketball player who had an on-court altercation with Shaquille O'Neal during their playing careers, but they later became colleagues and friends after retirement.

description.zh-cn: 美国前职业篮球运动员，曾与沙奎尔·奥尼尔在迈阿密热火队搭档，共同赢得2006年NBA总冠军。
description.en: American former professional basketball player who partnered with Shaquille O'Neal on the Miami Heat to win the 2006 NBA championship.

description.zh-cn: 一支位于美国德克萨斯州休斯顿的职业篮球队。
description.en: A professional basketball team based in Houston, Texas, USA.

description.zh-cn: 一支位于美国伊利诺伊州芝加哥的职业篮球队。
description.en: A professional basketball team based in Chicago, Illinois, USA.

description.zh-cn: 一支位于美国密歇根州底特律的职业篮球队。
description.en: A professional basketball team based in Detroit, Michigan, USA.

description.zh-cn: 美国佛罗里达州奥兰多地区的主要报纸。
description.en: The primary newspaper of Orlando, Florida, USA.

description.zh-cn: 作为沙奎尔·奥尼尔的继父，菲利普·哈里森在其十三岁时开始教他打篮球，对他的成长和职业生涯起到了关键的推动作用。
description.en: As Shaquille O'Neal's stepfather, Phillip Harrison began teaching him basketball at the age of thirteen, playing a crucial role in his development and career.

description.zh-cn: 在路易斯安那州立大学学习商学并为校篮球队效力，但为了参加NBA选秀提前结束了大学学业。
description.en: Studied business and played for the university's basketball team at Louisiana State University, but left early to enter the NBA draft.

description.zh-cn: 沙奎尔·奥尼尔在1992年NBA选秀中被奥兰多魔术队以状元签选中，正式开启其辉煌的职业生涯。
description.en: Shaquille O'Neal was selected by the Orlando Magic with the first overall pick in the 1992 NBA draft, officially beginning his illustrious professional career.

relationships.target: 奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂

description.zh-cn: 入选奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂。
description.en: Inducted into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame.

description.zh-cn: 入选FIBA篮球名人堂。
description.en: Inducted into the FIBA Hall of Fame.

description.zh-cn: 在沙奎尔·奥尼尔与奥兰多魔术队续约谈判期间，《奥兰多哨兵报》发起的一项民意调查显示，91.3%的球迷认为他不值1.15亿美元的合同，这最终坚定了他离开奥兰多的决心。
description.en: During Shaquille O'Neal's contract extension negotiations with the Orlando Magic, a poll conducted by the Orlando Sentinel showed that 91.3% of fans believed he was not worth a $115 million contract, which solidified his decision to leave Orlando.

description.zh-cn: 在菲尔·杰克森执教洛杉矶湖人队期间，沙奎尔·奥尼尔作为其麾下核心球员，共同赢得了三连冠。
description.en: Under coach Phil Jackson at the Los Angeles Lakers, Shaquille O'Neal was a core player, and together they won three consecutive championships.

description.zh-cn: 在湖人生涯后期，沙奎尔·奥尼尔与队友科比·布莱恩特的矛盾日益激化，科比公开批评奥尼尔，最终导致奥尼尔在2004年被交易，湖人“OK组合”解体。
description.en: In the later part of his Lakers career, the conflict between Shaquille O'Neal and teammate Kobe Bryant intensified. Bryant publicly criticized O'Neal, ultimately leading to O'Neal's trade in 2004 and the breakup of the Lakers' "Shaq-Kobe" duo.

description.zh-cn: 在1999年11月10日湖人对阵火箭的比赛中，沙奎尔·奥尼尔与查尔斯·巴克利发生肢体冲突，两人均被驱逐出场。
description.en: In a game between the Lakers and the Rockets on November 10, 1999, Shaquille O'Neal and Charles Barkley were involved in a physical altercation, resulting in both being ejected from the game.

description.zh-cn: 球员时期虽曾有过冲突，但两人在退役后共同担任电视节目球评，关系和好。
description.en: Although they had conflicts during their playing careers, they became friends after retirement, working together as television analysts.

description.zh-cn: 作为迈阿密热火队的队友，沙奎尔·奥尼尔与德韦恩·韦德共同带领球队赢得了2006年NBA总冠军。
description.en: As teammates on the Miami Heat, Shaquille O'Neal and Dwyane Wade led the team to win the 2006 NBA championship.

description.zh-cn: 在1995年NBA总决赛中，休士顿火箭队以4-0横扫了沙奎尔·奥尼尔所在的奥兰多魔术队，阻止了他首次夺冠。
description.en: In the 1995 NBA Finals, the Houston Rockets swept the Shaquille O'Neal-led Orlando Magic 4-0, preventing him from winning his first championship.

description.zh-cn: 在1996年东部联盟决赛中，迈克尔·乔丹率领的芝加哥公牛队以4-0横扫了沙奎尔·奥尼尔所在的奥兰多魔术队。
description.en: In the 1996 Eastern Conference Finals, the Michael Jordan-led Chicago Bulls swept the Shaquille O'Neal-led Orlando Magic 4-0.

description.zh-cn: 在2004年NBA总决赛中，底特律活塞队以4-1击败了拥有“F4”阵容的洛杉矶湖人队，阻止了沙奎尔·奥尼尔赢得第四个冠军。
description.en: In the 2004 NBA Finals, the Detroit Pistons defeated the Los Angeles Lakers' "F4" lineup 4-1, preventing Shaquille O'Neal from winning his fourth championship.
